articles.title: Ian McKellen Will Not Return To ‘Player Kings’ In West End Following Fall - Deadline
articles.description: Sir Ian McKellen will not return to the  Player Kings West End show after his fall
articles.content:
Ian McKellen will not feature in the final three performances of Player Kingsin London’s West End after his fall.
The Lord of the Rings acting icon fractured his wrist and sustained other injuries a… [+911 chars]

articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.title: Rare Lunar Standstill Could Illuminate Stonehenge Mystery This Weekend — Here's How To Watch It - Forbes
articles.description: The last major lunar standstill happened nearly 20 years ago and experts believe this year’s could reveal exciting connections between ancient monuments like Stonehenge and the moon.
articles.content: Skygazers are in for another rare astronomical event this week called a major lunar standstill, a spectacle archaeologists hope will finally shed light on historic sites like Stonehenge, following ot… [+3955 chars]
